metaDescription: Sell your Single Cask Nation whisky. We buy SCN retail releases and online-only single casks. Top prices for rare batches.
heroHeadline: Sell Your Single Cask Nation Whisky
heroSubhead: Direct buyer for SCN Retail and Online Exclusives.
introParagraph: Single Cask Nation (SCN) is the premier American independent bottler. Founded by Jewish Whisky Company, their knack for picking unique, high-quality casks has built a massive cult following.
photoChecklist: Front label showing Cask # and Distillation Date
conditionFactors: Label: SCN labels are detailed. Check for tears.
Release Type: Retail (US stores) vs Online (Membership). Both are valuable.
Fill: Modern bottlings should be perfect.
pricingFactors: Distillery: SCN Clynelish 9yo and Laphroaig 14yo are legends.
Cask Type: Odd finishes (Mezcal, Sherry) often trade high.
Rarity: Online exclusives had tiny outturns.
Grain: SCN bottles great grain whisky (Girvan, Invergordon) which we buy.

faqs.question: Do you buy the bourbon?
faqs.answer: Yes, SCN Wild Turkey and MGP bourbons are sought after.

faqs.question: What about 'Water of Life'?
faqs.answer: The film tie-in bottles? Yes, we buy them.

faqs.question: Do you buy the Pre-Prohibition style rye?
Is it worth shipping one bottle?
faqs.answer: For high-value SCN (>$200), yes. For entry level, we prefer batches.

faqs.question: How do I sell my whole membership allocation?
faqs.answer: Send us a photo of the group. We do lot buys.

faqs.question: Do you buy JWC (Jewish Whisky Company)?
faqs.answer: Yes, SCN is the brand of JWC.
